resource.http://dev.llgc.org.uk/sas/full_text: <span class="HwtZe" lang="en"><span class="jCAhz ChMk0b"><span class="ryNqvb">The city of Ivry-sur-Seine bought the old Manufacture in 2009. Eighteen months of work, financed by the State, the region, the city and the department, to fit out two performance halls, of 400 and <span class="jCAhz ChMk0b"><span class="ryNqvb">100 places, the Crédac (Contemporary Art Center of Ivry) and the EPSAA (Higher Professional School of Graphic Arts and Architects).
resource.chars: The city of Ivry-sur-Seine bought the old Manufacture in 2009. Eighteen months of work, financed by the State, the region, the city and the department, to fit out two performance halls, of 400 and 100 places, the Crédac (Contemporary Art Center of Ivry) and the EPSAA (Higher Professional School of Graphic Arts and Architects).

resource.http://dev.llgc.org.uk/sas/full_text: <span class="HwtZe" lang="en"><span class="jCAhz ChMk0b"><span class="ryNqvb">Interior hall restored, preserved in its state, with its peripheral mezzanine and its central canopy. <span class="jCAhz ChMk0b"><span class="ryNqvb">A public reception area with bar and bookstore, where meetings, readings, literary or philosophical cafés take place.
resource.chars: Interior hall restored, preserved in its state, with its peripheral mezzanine and its central canopy. A public reception area with bar and bookstore, where meetings, readings, literary or philosophical cafés take place.
